meanings.sent1: The intestacies of the deceased caused confusion among the family.
meanings.sent2: Legal disputes arose due to the intestacies of those who passed away without a will.
meanings.sent3: The lawyer joked that dealing with intestacies was like solving a puzzle without all the pieces.
meanings.sent4: The intestacies left behind by the deceased were like a tangled web waiting to be unraveled.
meanings.sent5: The intestacies of the estate were as complex as a maze with no map.

meanings.definition: The condition of having no valid will at the time of death.
meanings.sent1: Families faced financial challenges due to intestacies when a will was missing.
meanings.sent2: The intestacies of the deceased led to unexpected inheritances for some relatives.
meanings.sent3: It was ironic that the millionaire's intestacies left his fortune up for grabs.
meanings.sent4: The intestacies of the late businessman's estate were like a treasure hunt without a map.
meanings.sent5: The lawyer had to navigate through the intestacies of the will to find the rightful heirs.
